name: 2048 Anywhere: TV, Watch and More
description:
We present you amazing 2048 puzzle that you can play everywhere: on your iPhone, iPad, Apple TV and Apple Watch!

Game rules:
* Move all number tiles to one of four directions - collided tiles of the same value sum up and form a new double-value tile!
* Reach number 2048!
* After that - don't stop and compete with your friends in top charts!

Enjoy!
